ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuModels

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu.Model<IView>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuModels.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Question>

    public class Question
extends Model<IView>
implements java.lang.Comparable<Question>, java.io.Serializable
    The object that represents a question that has been asked by a user. This may include question text, a picture, the upvotes that the question has received, the replies to the question, the location from which the question was attached if desired and the answers that have been added to the question by other users which may include upvotes, a picture, and replies.
    Version:
    2.0 Nov.22,2014
    Author:
    wrflemin, Alex Makepeace
    See Also:
    Answer, Reply, Picture, Serialized Form
